description: Explore Seattle on foot and meet new friends!
detailInformation: We'll meet on campus at 7am-- location will be sent after sign ups close. Sign ups close when full or on Saturday, April 20th, at 6pm. Must bring your own gear!

description: Join us for an unforgettable adventure as we hike Mt. Rainier this weekend—let's conquer the summit together!
detailInformation: We'll meet on campus at 6am-- location will be sent after sign ups close. Sign ups close when full or on Thursday, April 25th, at 11pm. Must bring your own gear!

description: Take a scenic bike ride with new friends along the Burke Gilman!
detailInformation: We'll meet on campus at 8am—location details will be sent after sign-ups close. Sign-ups close when full or on Thursday, April 18th, at 9pm. Please note, you must bring your own biking gear!
